title: Many Roads
description: Roads go everywhere: around lakes, over hills, and through tunnels! The book Many Roads shows students all the places roads can lead. The patterned text is supported by descriptive illustrations, and emergent readers will be able to use their knowledge of high-frequency words as well as picture clues to help navigate their way through the story. Students will also have the opportunity to make inferences and draw conclusions and to identify prepositions in the text.
meta: corners, dead end, everywhere, roller coaster, tunnel, winds
Make Inferences/Draw Conclusions : Make inferences and draw conclusions
High-Frequency Words : Identify and use high-frequency words see, what and you

Promote higher-order thinking for small groups
or whole class
